uk.co.strangeskies.text.properties

Interface Localized<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the value
    All Superinterfaces:
    Observable<T>, ObservableValue<T>

    public interface Localized<T>
extends ObservableValue<T>
    A localized property interface which is observable over the value changes due to updated locale.
